name: BabyAGI
key_features: Dashboard for function management and logging
description: BabyAGI is an experimental framework for building self-improving autonomous agents.
long_description: Originally released in 2023 as a minimalist LLM-powered task agent, BabyAGI now provides a function-based framework that registers, stores, and executes tasks with a dependency graph, persistent memory, and a web dashboard for monitoring and key management.
